text: Party time! Cheryl Burke and Matthew Lawrence celebrated their impending nuptials with a sweet engagement party full of loved ones, as seen in a series of photos posted to the Dancing With the Stars alum ’ s Instagram on Friday, July 27. “ This past weekend @ matthewlawrence and I celebrated our engagement with our families and some of our closest friends, and I ’ ve been daydreaming of it ever since, ” the professional dancer wrote of the bash thrown by DWTS pro Kym Johnson and her husband, Shark Tank ‘ s Robert Herjaveck. One of those friends included Lawrence ’ s former Boy Meets World costar, Ben Savage, who shared a photo of himself next to the actor. “ Congratulations on your engagement @ matthewlawrence,
